what: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: NOTE: package used internal purposes moment.

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: Helper Package Recalculating Effect Sizes Meta-Analyses.

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: Meta-Analyses quantify combine effects published scientific literature. Different ways exist calculate effect size (uncertainty) single scientific study. packages provides various effect size calculation methods group differences.

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
text: Install metapp GitHub:

title: Helper Package for Recalculating Effect Sizes in Meta-Analyses
code: library(metapp)  # calculate a SMD with Hedges correction for small sample bias smd(x1 = 5, x2 = 7, sd1 = 2, sd2 = 3, n1 = 20, n2 = 18) #>           es       var #> 1 -0.7763268 0.1134856

what: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
text: Calculates confidence interval

title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
text: es data frame class mpp effect size variance. example, output md, smd, scr. level confidence level. Defaults 0.95. df degrees freedom. Defaults NA, assumes normal distribution. Otherwise t-distribution assumed.

title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
text: data.frame effect size (es), variance (var) lower upper limits confidence interval (ci_low, ci_high).

title: Get the confidence interval for a given effect size — get_ci
code: # calculate a SMD first g <- smd(x1 = 10, x2 = 15, sd1 = 3, sd2 = 4, n1 = 11, n2 = 9)  # calculate confidence interval get_ci(g) #>          es       var   ci_low    ci_high #> 1 -1.375888 0.2493469 -2.35459 -0.3971872

title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
text: Calculates Hedges correction factor small sample bias

title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
text: x numeric, degrees freedom. exact Whether use exact formula approximation. Defaults true.

title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
text: numeric, bias correction factor.

title: Calculating the Hedges correction factor — j
Calculating a mean difference — md
text: Calculates raw MD effect size simple group comparison.

title: Calculating a mean difference — md
code: md(x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2, var_homo = TRUE)

title: Calculating a mean difference — md
text: x1, x2 means first seconds group. sd1, sd2 standard deviations first second group. n1, n2 sample sizes first second group. var_homo whether variance estimator pooled standard deviation used, assumes homoscedasticity population variance (defaults TRUE).

title: Calculating a mean difference — md
text: data frame class mpp effect size (es) variance (var).

title: Calculating a mean difference — md

title: Pool groups — pool_groups
text: data frame group mean (mean), standard deviation (sd) sample size (n).

title: Pool groups — pool_groups

what: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
text: Calculates change score standard deviation group pre post standard deviations pre-post correlation.

title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
text: sd_pre, sd_post pre post standard deviations. r pre-post correlation.

title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd
text: numeric, standard deviation change scores.

title: Get change score standard deviation from pre-post correlation — r_to_sdd

what: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — scr
title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — scr
text: Calculates standardized change score group comparison raw score based standardization (see Morris 2008).

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — scr
code: scr(   x1d,   x2d,   sd1pre,   sd2pre,   n1,   n2,   r = NA,   r1 = NA,   r2 = NA,   type = 2,   var_becker = FALSE )

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — scr
text: x1d, x2d mean changes first second group sd1pre, sd2pre pre-score standard deviations first second group n1, n2 sample sizes first second group. r1, r2, r pre-post correlation first second group (type=1), groups (type=2). type Type effect size, see Morris (2008). (1) difference standardized mean changes group, (2) standadization using pooled pre sd. Defaults 2. var_becker type=1, whether variance estimator Becker (1988) used (calculating variances group adding ). Otherwise uses variance estimation Morris (2008, Typ ppc1). Defaults FALSE.

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — scr
text: data frame class mpp effect size (es) variance (var).

title: Calculating a standardized change score difference (raw score based standardization) — scr

title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
text: Calculates pre-post correlation group pre, post change score standard deviation.

title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
text: sd_pre, sd_post pre post standard deviations. sd_d standard deviation change scores

title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r
text: numeric, pre-post correlation.

title: Get pre-post correlation from change score standard deviation — sdd_to_r

what: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
text: Calculates SMD effect size simple group comparison.

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
code: smd(   x1,   x2,   sd1,   sd2,   n1,   n2,   hedges = TRUE,   homo = TRUE,   vartype = 1,   exact = TRUE )

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
text: x1, x2 means first seconds group. sd1, sd2 standard deviations first second group. n1, n2 sample sizes first second group. hedges whether bias correction small sample sizes according Hedges applied (defaults TRUE). homo whether pooled sd used standardizer (assuming homogeneous population variances). Defaults TRUE. vartype whether use variance estimator proposed Hedges (1, default metafor), variance estimator Borenstein (2), default RevMan (3)). Defaults 1. exact whether use exact formula small sample size correction (otherwise approximation used). relevant hedges=TRUE. Defaults TRUE.

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
text: data frame class mpp effect size (es) variance (var).

title: Calculating a standardized mean difference — smd
